TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
In DATE the applicant 's grandmother , PERSON , was executed by ORG of the ORG and her personal property was confiscated .
In DATE she was fully exonerated as a victim of political repression .
In DATE and DATE ORG of the Vinnytsia Region confirmed that PERSON had been rehabilitated posthumously and noted that there were no records concerning the confiscated property .

On DATE ORG ( “ the Commission ” ) awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) , which was equal to PERCENT of CARDINAL times the minimum [ NORP ] salary , in compensation for the property confiscated from PERSON in DATE . ORG based that decision on Law No . CARDINAL-XII and ORG . CARDINAL and CARDINAL ( see the “ Relevant domestic law and practice ” below ) . In its examination of the evidence , it noted that while the confiscation of “ the personal property ” of PERSON was confirmed by the DATE verdict , there was no itemised list of that property . ORG checked the applicant 's allegation that the house of his grandmother had been confiscated together with some other property , and found that this was not true . In fact , as confirmed by the real estate registry books of DATE kept by the local council in the village where PERSON had lived , the applicant 's mother ( the daughter of PERSON ) had been living in that house and owned CARDINAL of it at the time . Furthermore , in DATE she had sold her part of the house to a third person , which was also confirmed by documentation . The villagers contacted by the Commission for further verification confirmed this too . Moreover , the house in question was no longer standing .

In DATE the applicant brought a civil claim against the Commission with the Frankivskyy ORG seeking an increase of the compensation to ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL , with a view to covering , in particular , the market value of QUANTITY houses and the income which his grandmother could have made during about a DATE period if she had not been executed .

On DATE the court rejected the applicant 's claim as unsubstantiated , having found that the contested decision of the Commission was in compliance with law and based on an accurate assessment of the facts of the case .
On DATE and DATE ORG and ORG respectively upheld that judgment .

LAW . CARDINAL-XII “ On Rehabilitation of Victims of Political Repression in GPE ” of DATE provided for restitution in kind of confiscated buildings and other property wherever possible ( if the house was not occupied and the property was still standing ) . It was the prerogative of ORG to establish the amount of pecuniary compensation awarded where in - kind restitution was not possible .

Regulation of the Cabinet of Ministers No . CARDINAL “ On the Procedure for Payment of Financial Compensation , Return of Property or Reimbursement of its Value to Rehabilitated Citizens or their Heirs ” of DATE provided for compensation equal to CARDINAL times the minimum salary in cases where it was impossible to restore the property in kind . In any event , the total amount of the compensation could not exceed CARDINAL times the minimum salary regardless of the value of the confiscated buildings and other property .

Pursuant to Resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers No . CARDINAL “ On the Procedure of Settlements with ORG ” of DATE , the calculation unit for determining the compensation was set at MONEY of the minimum salary ( UAH CARDINAL.CARDINAL instead of CARDINAL ) .
